text:
There should be a command by which one should be able to create a manifest file 
at a location. One of the parameters should be the implementation version.
This will allow the build process to include a manifest file which will be 
automatically created & updated with the build version. The build version will 
be specified by say the build master on the command line to ant which will be 
extracted & used in the parameters to update the implementation version of the 
JAR
